author: carlbeek
content: Please can I get a review/approval for merging https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8074

author: carlbeek
content: Also, <@642887713246150666>, you've had some ideas (eg. here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/931#issuecomment-1877120667) regarding how RIPs fit into the greater standards ecosystem, and generally it's a topic that  <@415548822983278593> and I would love to discuss further. Would us joining the next EIPIP call be a good platform for this?

author: poojaranjan
content:
